resources.string: Everything about the Resurrection Remix OS
Show your support to Resurrection Remix OS

Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.

Select which navigation mode to use on your device
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Unable to load image from content provider
A very unique and fully-customizable gesture-based navigation bar
Back and Home are required to be set at all times. To change a Back or Home assignment, set the desired assignment first.\n\nAlso, setting a double tap action will delay single tap a bit.
When only a right or left action is assigned, the action applies to the full bar.
Fine tune long swipe thresholds based on a percentage of Fling interface width or height
Show a trail on swipe gestures
Increase or decrease the time it takes to execute a long press
When keyboard is showing, long press left or right to move the text cursor to left or right.\nKeep longpressing to keep moving the cursor, single tap on bar to go to home screen.
Are you sure you want to reset Fling to stock settings?
Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Used also as fallback for automatic color
Each bar is animated more smoothly
Pulse animates a smooth lava lamp style color blend
Sync color with album arts. Overrides Lava Lamp and lines opacity.
Are you sure you want to reset these colors to default?

When in editor mode, medium press and drag a button to change its position or long press a button to show the edit menu. Button position may be changed while menu is showing.\n\nSetting a double tap action will delay single tap a bit.

Button backlight brightness will adjust based on the screen's brightness level
Button backlight will only appear when buttons are pressed rather than on all the time. Timeout still impacts this feature.
Customize various hardware buttons on your device like home, back, and menu
Actions will be executed on screen off. On screen on the previous state will be restored.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off

To dismiss your notifications, swipe left or right on the fingerprint sensor on the back of your phone.

Blur background settings for system UI
Blur the background when you pull down the status bar
Set the background of notifications translucent
Make the background of quick settings transparent
Blur the background of recent apps activity
Blur personalizations are disabled during keyguard view! Only translucent notifications are enabled!

These colors are the ones tinting the blur background. Instead of the normal grey, you can now choose the colors in the way you like.
There are three color filters: One used for light backgrounds, one used for dark backgrounds and one used for light/dark backgrounds.
So how are these colors working??
Simple, as the titles say, the light filter will be used for lighter backgrounds, dark filter for dark backgrounds and the mixed filter one will be used for backgrounds not too dark but neither too light.
These colors are used for both BlurBackgrounds: StatusBar one and RecentsApps one
Blur personalizations are disabled during Keyguard view! Only Translucent Notifications are enabled!

Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the reset option.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Note: Most apps need to be restarted for custom values to take effect

Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered. It is recommended that you use a pin under 6 digits. If PIN Crosses 6 digits , you may be locked out. You have been warned

You are about to change layout to tabs (nougat) which was present in previous versions of RR-OS and is the default one. Are you sure you want to continue?
You are about to change layout to classic (marshmallow) which was present in previous versions of RR-OS. Are you sure you want to continue?

You are about to change layout to bottom navigation layout (oreo) which is a brand new layout in RR-OS configurations. It might be a little different that the usual layout. Are you sure you want to continue?

Pre-written summaries will be selected at random and will change everytime you start the Settings app.\nThis overrides any custom summary set.
